author: stephan
msg: AbstractGeneratorTestCase rewritten to wrote more intuitionally, and
allow to test more than the generated document.

author: stephan
msg: Add mock classes for the environment, that makes possible to test
Cocoon components outside of the normal environment (Inspired by the
Strutstestcase project).

author: stefano
msg: removed dependency on 'excalibur-naming' since it's already included in 'excalibur-compatibility' and this allows the avalon guys to remove the excalibur-naming project from their gump descriptors

author: stephan
msg: Add dependency to excalibur's resourcemanager.

author: giacomo
msg: Fixing reload behaviour
